duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement applications and end-to-end solutions.
Lead the design of applications, solution architecture, and underlying information technologies on Public Cloud.
Write and compartmentalize solutions with good code hygiene.
Design and run applications on Public Cloud (Azure, AWS) from Development through Production.
Ensure resilience, security, performance, and availability of end-to-end system solutions on Cloud.
Define/create runtime environments with appropriate cloud technologies including network and storage.
Demonstrate a proven track record with IaC, CI/CD/DevOps/DevSecOps, Test Automation, Supportability.
Apply Equities and Options domain knowledge in the design and architecture of real-time trading systems.
Understand real-time systems concepts and market structure in relation to financial calculations, price feeds, and order management.
Identify growth opportunities, refine strategies, and measure the performance of marketing campaigns using data-driven insights.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
